attributes.action: Ring fence guaranteed funding for NHS, emergency services and education
attributes.additional_details: Especially in this time of crisis we are dependent on some of the most poorly paid members of our society.  These people are literally putting themselves in harms way to protect us.  We should reward them accordingly.   Much like the army, its essential to have them and not need them, rather than need them and not have them.
attributes.background: I believe that health, safety and education is what we need to ensure for the health of our society.   These essential pillars of our society should not be bargaining chips for political success.  Please, please safeguard these.

rejection.details:
We understand that you're worried about funding for the NHS, emergency services and education, but we're not sure what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do.  

In particular, we're not sure whether you want to increase funding and/or wages for the NHS, emergency services and education or whether you want to keep funding the same. 

You could start a new petition explaining what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do. 

You might also like to sign and share one of these petitions instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300925
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313488
